Uses of Class
com.mordoch.chemtools.formulatools.Equation

  • Packages that use Equation 
    Package Description
    com.mordoch.chemtools.formulatools
    This package contains the formula-building and parsing tools.
    com.mordoch.chemtools.util
    This package contains utility classes such as LookupTable.

    • Uses of Equation in com.mordoch.chemtools.formulatools

      Methods in com.mordoch.chemtools.formulatools that return Equation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Equation FtHelper.parseEquation(java.lang.String equationToParse)
      Takes an equation in string form, such as "H2 + (.5)O2 ---> H2O1", and returns an Equation object representing that equation.

    • Uses of Equation in com.mordoch.chemtools.util

      Methods in com.mordoch.chemtools.util with parameters of type Equation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Stoichiometry.findProductRatio(Equation equation, int relativeToProduct)
      Computes the mol ratio of a formula relative to a given product.
      static double Stoichiometry.findReactantRatio(Equation equation, int relativeToReactant)
      Computes the mol ratio of a formula relative to a given reactant.
      static double Stoichiometry.percentYield(Equation equation, double actualYield, double gramsOfReactant, int indexOfReactant, int indexOfProduct)
      Computes the percent yield of a reaction, first by finding theoretical yield, then by determining percent yield.
      static double Stoichiometry.theoreticalYield(Equation equation, double gramsOfReactant, int indexOfReactant, int indexOfProduct)
      Computes the theoretical yield of a product in a reaction.
